name: movement_with_collisions
content: JSON-encoded dictionary with these key-value pairs - 'entity': string, 'index': integer, 'from': (integer, integer), 'to': (integer: integer), and 'collisions': list of dictionaries each containing 'entity': string and 'position': (integer, integer)
meaning: Movement requested by the entity of type 'entity' with index 'index', from the 'from' location to the 'to' location (both given as (x,y) co-ordinates), together with a list of those entities with which the moving entity would collide if the movement occurred - the collision list gives the entity type and position as an (x,y) pair
